title: A Passion for Bad Fashion: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
itunes:title: A Passion for Bad Fashion: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
description:
Langston and David answer a listener's email about gay stylists intentionally dressing rappers bad as revenge for their homophobic lyrics.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
